meta.content: All Bond County CUSD #2 Schools and Programs are under Remote Learning for the remainder of the school year.

div.font: All Bond County CUSD #2 Schools and Programs are under Remote Learning for the remainder of the school year.

div.span: Link to full size document- At A Glance Remote Learning Information

span.span: Our district is committed to supporting our students and families throughout this closure. Hard copies of the Remote Learning Kits will arrive at your home by mail.

td.h2: Learn more about our Academic Foundation

div.font: The B.C.C.U. #2 Academic Foundation is a major supporting force in our district schools. The Foundation, consisting of both parents and community members, strives to assist in bringing the best possible education to the students of B.C.C.U. #2.

br.font: The Foundation’s goal is to provide academic and vocational opportunities for the students of our district. The Foundation has benefited our students with many educational tools that the district could not otherwise provide and which keep our students up-to-date in classroom materials and technology.

div.span: Comet Cards are available for purchase online in the Web Store
If ordered online, your card will be available for pick-up in the High School Office.

div.div:
To receive announcements and newsletters via email, please make sure your email information is up-to-date using Skyward’s Family Access and the Skylert tab in the left menu bar. Using the Skylert tab, you can manage your family’s contact information and update your information, as needed. The district will be using SchoolMessenger in cooperation with our Skyward Family Access to send out announcements and newsletters throughout the year.
If you do not have a student or family access account, please contact your school office if you wish to receive announcements and newsletters.

strong.font: Dr. Wes Olson, Superintendent of Schools
